PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2000-10532000-06-260,  ,  ,  ,  ,  INDUSTRY
PrecisOrder requiring the CANADIAN RADIO-TELEVISION AND TELECOMMUNICATIONS COMMISSION to report to the Governor in Council, once a year for the next five years, on the status of competition in Canadian telecommunications markets and on the deployment and accessibility of advanced telecommunications infrastructure and services in urban and rural areas in all regions of Canada, and to submit its first report no later than September 28, 2001.
Attachments
